about_the_game:
In Deepest Dungeons, a rogue-like adventure with extraction elements, you will descend into the depths of an ever-changing labyrinth. The maze shifts with each venture, challenging your resolve as you delve deeper into the darkness.

You play as a young adventurer who follows the king's call to reclaim the valuable runes stolen by mysterious monsters from the depths. With only the courage in your heart and the gear you gather along the way, you must survive the relentless dangers of the dungeons and explore the deeper levels to bring back what was taken.




As you explore, you'll face powerful creatures, deadly traps, and uncover hidden treasures. To reach deeper levels of the dungeon, you'll need to find special keys hidden within. Along the way, you'll discover rare items and equipment to enhance your survivability, giving you the edge needed to pull through the dangers below.




Each dungeon is a unique maze filled with its own set of challenges and dangers. As you descend further, the mazes grow larger and demand greater use of your wits and the tools you've discovered to navigate and locate the exit.




Sometimes, you'll come across exits that lead out of the dungeon. It's your choice: return to the surface to save your progress in the Stashbox and reorganize yourself, or continue deeper into the dungeons, risking everything for greater rewards.




As you venture through the dungeons, you'll come across gear and items, left behind by those who ventured before you, that enhance your abilities in combat but also provide crucial advantages as you navigate the dungeon’s twisting corridors.




The dungeons are filled with lurking monsters and deadly traps. As an untrained adventurer from the countryside, each enemy you face requires special attention. The deeper you go, the more threatening the monsters become. Stay alert - every encounter could be your last.




Death isn't the end. While you'll lose your progress, the items in your Stashbox from previous runs can aid your next attempt. Learn, adapt, and descend again, growing stronger with each fall.

name: Deepest Dungeons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 (1GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7770 (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or AMD R9 290/AMD RX480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible

short_description: Venture into the ever-shifting labyrinth of Deepest Dungeons, a rogue-like with extraction elements. Explore a maze that changes with each attempt, battle enemies, avoid deadly traps and collect gear. Survive long enough to reach deeper levels, or escape with your belongings and try a new descend.
